scenario_text.value:
It feels so weird. I don’t sense anybody else
around at all except those two.
You know, it’s strange.
What’s strange?

You see, there was a TV show that used to be
on back when my dad was a kid.
And this place really reminds me of that.
Oh, interesting...
Hey, Miu! Take a look at this!

What is it? Oh, wow! What a strange-looking
brooch!
Do you think it’d look good on you?

Yeah! I can put it on my hat to make it look
cool or on my top to make me look cute!
Great! Then here, you can have it!
Here you—ah!
I dropped the brooch!
Oh no! Now it’s all bent out of shape.
Yeah, that’s a bummer...
Guess I can’t use it after all.
Yay, thanks! I’m gonna wear it right now!
There we go...

Ooh, that looks great on you! You look so
cute, Miu!

Aww, thanks, Shakomon! But is it really okay
for me to just take this?
Why not? It’s not like we know who owns it.
That’s true! Might as well keep it, then!
